panels.description: Current status of the Geyser plugin

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  'Total Updates' as metric, total_updates as value
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Sealed Slots' as metric, sealed_slots as value
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Active Slots' as metric, active_slots as value
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Plugin Status Overview

panels.description: Total number of updates processed by the plugin

targets.rawSql:
SELECT total_updates
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Total Updates

panels.description: Number of slots that have been sealed

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sealed_slots
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Sealed Slots

targets.rawSql:
SELECT active_slots
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT monitored_account_changes
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT proof_requests_generated
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT db_writes
FROM geyser_stats
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  recorded_at as time,
  total_updates - LAG(total_updates) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) as "Updates per interval"
FROM geyser_stats
WHERE recorded_at > now() - interval '1 hour'
ORDER BY recorded_at

SELECT 
  recorded_at as time,
  sealed_slots - LAG(sealed_slots) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) as "Slots per interval"
FROM geyser_stats
WHERE recorded_at > now() - interval '1 hour'
ORDER BY recorded_at

SELECT 
  hypertable_name,
  chunk_name,
  pg_size_pretty(before_compression_total_bytes) as uncompressed_size,
  pg_size_pretty(after_compression_total_bytes) as compressed_size,
  ROUND((1.0 - (after_compression_total_bytes::float / before_compression_total_bytes::float)) * 100, 2) as compression_ratio
FROM timescaledb_information.compressed_chunk_stats
WHERE hypertable_name IN ('slots', 'account_changes')
ORDER BY chunk_name DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  hypertable_name,
  COUNT(*) as chunk_count,
  pg_size_pretty(SUM(total_bytes)) as total_size,
  pg_size_pretty(AVG(total_bytes)) as avg_chunk_size
FROM timescaledb_information.chunks
WHERE hypertable_name IN ('slots', 'account_changes')
GROUP BY hypertable_name

SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count
FROM proof_requests
GROUP BY status

SELECT 
  time_bucket('5 minutes', created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "New Requests"
FROM proof_requests
WHERE created_at > now() - interval '1 hour'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Most active accounts by change count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUBSTRING(account_pubkey, 1, 8) || '...' as account,
  COUNT(*) as changes
FROM account_changes
WHERE slot > (SELECT MAX(slot) - 100000 FROM account_changes)
GROUP BY account_pubkey
ORDER BY changes DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Most Active Accounts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_timestamp(slot * 0.4) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Account Changes"
FROM account_changes
WHERE slot > (SELECT MAX(slot) - 10000 FROM account_changes)
GROUP BY slot
ORDER BY slot
